se.lypson.common.gui
Class FilteredList

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.lcdui.Item
      javax.microedition.lcdui.CustomItem
          se.lypson.common.gui.FilteredList

public class FilteredList
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.CustomItem

A CustomItem component for lists that can be filtered by user input.

Author:
Tobias Persson

traverse

protected boolean traverse(int direction,
                           int viewportWidth,
                           int viewportHeight,
                           int[] visRect_inout)
Traverses the component.

Overrides:
traverse in class javax.microedition.lcdui.CustomItem
Parameters:
direction - the traversal direction - one of Canvas.UP, Canvas.RIGHT, Canvas.DOWN, Canvas.LEFT and CustomItem.NONE.
viewportWidth - the width of the viewport.
viewportHeight - the height of the viewport.
visRect_inout - the visible rectangle as input, the traversal rectangle as output. Not used.
Returns:
true if internal traversal has occured; otherwise, false.
